thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Gary Sneed
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Gary Sneed

author: Gary Sneed
title: Gary Sneed
text: I called and received very helpful advice on which model would work best for our conditions. They suggested that I consider a reconditioned unit with a substantial savings. I placed the order on line and was notified in 2 hours that the product had been shipped! You can't do better than that. Installation was easy and product performs as expected. Our location has very weak signal and with the antenna and amplifier we have 2-4 bars depending on weather and other conditions.
